profile.name: Milad Afkhami
profile.job: Head of Front-End Development Team at Arsh Co.
profile.jobDescription0: More than 4 years of experience in front-end development
profile.jobDescription-1: Working as a Front-End developer and helping other members in their problems.
profile.jobDescription:
A skilled software engineer 
with a proven ability to analyze, design, develop and maintain large scale software solutions that meet business requirements as well as performance and quality indexes.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hey, I'm Milad. I'm a developer, student, mentor, and at late nights writer!
about.p2: I work at Arsh Co. as head of front-end development team.
about.p3: I grew up in Shahr-e-Rey a district in south of Tehran state.
about.p4: After spending my elementary and middle school and I got accepted for NODET and spent my high school in there.
about.p5: After I was ranked 697 at NEA (national entrance exam), I got accepted to study electrical engineering in Shahid Beheshti University
about.p6: I really didn't felt being an electrical engineering and after couple of semesters, I changed my field to computer engineering and till then I am working as a developer and I'm enjoying it.
about.p7: I spend my free time reading, listening to musics, watching tv shows and enjoying time with my close friends.

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.born_desc: Born and raised as an only child ...
timeline.earlySchool_desc: when I was 4, I took a test to see if i'm ready for school and I passed it! but I was even smaller than kids in my age so my parents decided that I stick to the routine.
timeline.startingSchool_desc: Nothing spacial to say about this, like every other iranian kid, I went to a school under a system that kill creativity and happiness of students.
timeline.firstComputer_desc: My father bought a computer for my 10th birthday, Whoa!
timeline.choosingNEAPath_desc: I was hopelessly in love with Mathematics, I always dreamed my 40 y.o. version to be a bald skinny not attractive professor who hates kids, but after putting all my efforts and love to learning it, I decided to concentrate on national entrance exam.
timeline.university_desc: Endeavor paid off! I got accepted to study electrical engineering at Shahid Beheshti university, couldn't be happier but ...
timeline.tookCoupleOfSemestersOff_desc: I took couple of semesters off to concentrate on studying programming and also because I wasn't in a real bad mental situation.
timeline.changingField_desc: After one year of flip-flopping, I decided to change my field of study to computer engineering. I can't forget the hell my parents raised because of decision.
timeline.firstDayAtWork_desc: As a night owl, I had a firm reason to hate that day and the days ahead, but my love for learning and competing, helped me keep going
timeline.growingMyHair: This is when I started to grow my hair :)
timeline.leftMyFirstJob_desc: As time goes by, I realized it wasn't really anything to learn for me in that company, so I officially quited my first job
timeline.startingAtAppTech_desc: I found a good company to experience new challenges. I improved my React knowledge in there and learned React Native.
timeline.startingAtArshCo_desc: After reaching a good knowledge of React, I decided to have a new challenge and working on larger projects and I chose Arsh Company to continue. despite my last superiors they were really nice to me
timeline.becomingTeamLead_desc: I proved myself to headquarters in my challenges and became head of front-end development team.
timeline.ielts_desc: I passed my IELTS exam with 7 score.
